data.message: Like face book but don't like there new messenger app .  It   is like a dam virus when someone sends you a  message with the app it  won't  let you get messages unless you  down load it gives you no choice . Wrote to face book and complained  there answer was THANK YOU for your input but did nothing about it . Owners of face book must be real hard up  don't download the new app it takes  to much info from your act
